title: Tropical Paradise in Indonesia's Anambas Archipelago with Four Onsite Restaurants & All-Inclusive Dining
description: Find the epitome of barefoot luxury scattered across six secluded islands, 13 beaches and 100 hectares of wilderness in Indonesia's Anambas Archipelago. Breathtaking from the moment you arrive, this eco-conscious paradise is surrounded by clear turquoise waters, lush tropical rainforests and vibrant coral reefs. Dine as you please with sumptuous all-inclusive dining across the resort's four eateries from Asian cuisine at Tree Tops Restaurant to the freshest of seafood at The Boat House. Sip refreshing cocktails as the sun sets over the lagoon at the Jules Verne Bar, rejuvenate with holistic wellness treatments at the Aura Spa & Wellbeing, or for the more adventurous, explore the islands with a jungle trek, mesmerising snorkelling expedition or traditional fishing trip.
